QuestData.Title: Saragosa's End
QuestData.Description: Using the mana crystals you provided, I have created this Power Focus.$b$bSaragosa is a glutton. She will be unable to resist its lure. Inside it lie magics that will greatly diminish her power. Let us hope she does not see through my ruse....$b$bPrepare yourself, $n, and speak to me again when you are ready to face Saragosa.
QuestData.LogDescription: Keristrasza wants you to use the Power Focus to lure Saragosa, and then defeat her.
QuestData.CompletionText: Saragosa must not be allowed to live!
QuestData.RewardText: This world is a better place now that Saragosa is no more, but our work is not yet finished.$b$bThe time has come to strike at Malygos himself!
